product.title: Bambi | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.ingress:
The forest critters are all a twitter when the new boy prince of the forest is born. And while Bambi might be a bit awkward, he proves to be the Great Prince of the Forest when danger sweeps through the woods. Bambi is the heartwarming tale of love, friendship, and overcoming life's problems.

Tie-in Activities: Bambi has many friends in the woods. Turn your backyard or front stoop into a natural oasis by making a peanut butter pinecone bird feeder with your child. Find a pinecone and tie some yarn or string around it. Plaster the cone with peanut butter and sprinkle birdseed all over it. Hang the pinecone feeder outside and watch your child stare in wide-eyed amazement as the local birds come to feed.

Whenever you are outside with your child, in the backyard or in the park, keep a list of all the different types of animals you see.
product.text:
Click on one of the tiles above to have more fun with Bambi.
